Rules

General Rules:
1. The site-wide rules apply. If you haven't read them yet, read them. Do not break them.
2. Play to win.
3. Do not quote any role PMs into the game thread, no PM timestamps or anything else. Paraphrasing is allowed, if in doubt, ask.
4. Do not use cryptography, invisible text, tiny text, or anything like that
5. Do not edit or delete your posts period.
6. Do not impersonate the moderator. I use the OOC tag on mod posts and when I edited a player's posts. Please do not use this tag.
7. Only talk about the game in the thread unless I have told you otherwise.
8. Do not bring outside factors in the game
9. No using dice tags or anything that proves randomness.
10. Breaking one of the rules may result in a modkill. Modkilling may or may not end the day.
11. I reserve the right to change the rules
12. If you're dead, you're dead. Not even a "Bah" post.
13. If I happen to not be online before the end, please let me post the final scene before revealing the result of the game.

Voting Rules:
1. Votes must be bolded, and in the format of VOTE: Player, using either the bold or the vote tags. Abbreviations, missing punctuation, and misspellings will be accepted as long as it is obvious to me who is being voted for. IMPORTANT: If I perceive it as a vote, it counts as a vote, even if it doesn't follow these rules exactly!
2. Unvoting is nice, but is not necessary.
3. You may vote to No Lynch, that requires the same number of votes as a lynch vote.
4. Once a majority of votes is reached (# of players / 2 + 1, rounded down), that person is lynched.
5. All living players, including the lynchee, may continue to post until I lock the thread.

Activity Rules:
1. Players who have not posted for 72 hours will be prodded.
2. Players who do not post within 36 hours of a prod will be replaced.
3. If you were to be prodded twice over a game Day or thrice over the whole game, you may be replaced at my discretion.
4. If you have declared V/LA, you may be exempted from prods during that time at my discretion.

Deadlines:
1. Each game Day will have a deadline of fourteen real life days (two weeks).
2. Each game Night will have a deadline of three real life days (72 hours).
3. In the event deadline is reached before a lynch has occurred, a No Lynch occurs.

Global Vanilla Town PM:
Welcome to The Shadows Within Mafia, you are a Vanilla Townie.

You have no additional ability except for your vote.

You may confirm here: viewtopic.php?f=2&t=34696 - The game will start when 10 out of 13 people have confirmed.

You win when all threats to the town are eliminated.


Global Mafia Wincon PM:
You win when you have taken over majority or nothing can stop it from happening.
Confirmation.
Confirmed.
